analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Tathāgataṁ, bhikkhave, arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ dve vitakkā bahulaṁ samudācaranti—
analyzed: tathāgata bhikkhave arahantam sammāsambuddham dve vitakkāḥ bahulam samudācaranti
a byāpajjhārāmaḥ bhikkhave tathāgataḥ a byāpajjharataḥ

original: Tamenaṁ, bhikkhave, tathāgataṁ abyāpajjhārāmaṁ abyāpajjharataṁ eseva vitakko bahulaṁ samudācarati:
analyzed: bhikkhave tathāgatam a byāpajjhārāmam a byāpajjha ratam eṣa iva vitakkaḥ bahulam samudācarati

original: ‘imāyāhaṁ iriyāya na kañci byābādhemi tasaṁ vā thāvaraṁ vā’ti.
analyzed: imāya aham iriyāya na kañci byābādhemi tasam vā thāvaram vā ati
paviveka ārāmaḥ bhikkhave tathāgataḥ paviveka rataḥ

original: Tamenaṁ, bhikkhave, tathāgataṁ pavivekārāmaṁ pavivekarataṁ eseva vitakko bahulaṁ samudācarati:
analyzed: tam ena bhikkhave tathāgatam paviveka ārāmam paviveka ratam eṣa iva vitakkaḥ bahulam samudācarati

original: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, tumhepi abyāpajjhārāmā viharatha abyāpajjharatā.
analyzed: tasmāt iha bhikkhave tumhe pi a byāpajjhārāmāḥ viharatha a byāpajjharatā

original: Tesaṁ vo, bhikkhave, tumhākaṁ abyāpajjhārāmānaṁ viharataṁ abyāpajjharatānaṁ eseva vitakko bahulaṁ samudācarissati:
analyzed: tesam vaḥ bhikkhave tumhākam a byāpajjhārāmānam viharatam a byāpajjharatānam esa eva vitakkaḥ bahulam samudācarissati

original: ‘imāya mayaṁ iriyāya na kañci byābādhema tasaṁ vā thāvaraṁ vā’ti.
analyzed: imāya mayam iriyāya na kañci tasam vā thāvaram vā ati
paviveka ārāmāḥ bhikkhave viharatha paviveka ratā

original: Tesaṁ vo, bhikkhave, tumhākaṁ pavivekārāmānaṁ viharataṁ pavivekaratānaṁ eseva vitakko bahulaṁ samudācarissati:
analyzed: tesam vaḥ bhikkhave tumhākam paviveka ārāmānam viharatam paviveka ratānam esa eva vitakkaḥ bahulam samudācarissati
kim akusala kim appahīna kim pajahāma ati
tam ve munim antima deha dhāri

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
